resources.string: Coffee Addicts is the place where coffee lovers and addicts are understood and always welcome!
"'cause nothing else truly matters when you wake up"
Whether you want to recharge your batteries or just enjoy a good cup of coffee, our baristas are happy to guide you to the perfect combination of flavours. Feel free to drop by:
Monday to Friday from 07:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. \nSaturday from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. \nSunday from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.
